Test Summary: Verify CBDC issuance and initial allocation to user accounts.
Test Data: issuance_amount: 1000000, recipient_account_ids: ['user123', 'user456', 'user789'], allocation_amounts: [500000, 300000, 200000], issuance_authority: CentralBankXYZ, transaction_timestamp: 2024-10-27T10:00:00Z, asset_type: CBDC-USD
Expected Result: status: Success, transaction_id: unique_transaction_id_001, total_issued: 1000000, account_balances: {'user123': 500000, 'user456': 300000, 'user789': 200000}, ledger_entry_created: True, issuance_authority_balance_change: -1000000, asset_type: CBDC-USD

Test Summary: Validate CBDC transfer between two user accounts.
Test Data: sender_account_id: user123, recipient_account_id: user456, transfer_amount: 100000, transaction_timestamp: 2024-10-27T11:00:00Z, asset_type: CBDC-USD
Expected Result: status: Success, transaction_id: unique_transaction_id_002, sender_balance: 400000, recipient_balance: 400000, ledger_entry_created: True, transaction_fee: 0.001, final_sender_balance: 399999.999, asset_type: CBDC-USD

Test Summary: Verify transaction failure when sender has insufficient funds.
Test Data: sender_account_id: user789, recipient_account_id: user123, transfer_amount: 300000, transaction_timestamp: 2024-10-27T12:00:00Z, asset_type: CBDC-USD
Expected Result: status: Failure, error_code: INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, error_message: Sender account has insufficient funds for the transfer., transaction_id: None, sender_balance: 200000, recipient_balance: 500000, ledger_entry_created: False, asset_type: CBDC-USD

Test Summary: Test CBDC redemption by a user and destruction by the Central Bank.
Test Data: redeemer_account_id: user456, redemption_amount: 50000, redemption_destination: CommercialBankBankAccount123, transaction_timestamp: 2024-10-27T13:00:00Z, asset_type: CBDC-USD
Expected Result: status: Success, transaction_id: unique_transaction_id_004, redeemer_balance: 350000, central_bank_balance_change: 50000, ledger_entry_created: True, redemption_processed: True, asset_type: CBDC-USD

Test Summary: Check for double spending of CBDC by attempting two transactions with the same balance before the first transaction is confirmed.
Test Data: sender_account_id: user123, recipient_account_id_1: user456, transfer_amount_1: 50000, recipient_account_id_2: user789, transfer_amount_2: 50000, transaction_timestamp: 2024-10-27T14:00:00Z, asset_type: CBDC-USD
Expected Result: transaction_1_status: Success, transaction_1_id: unique_transaction_id_005, transaction_1_sender_balance: 349999.999, transaction_1_recipient_balance: 450000, transaction_2_status: Failure, transaction_2_error_code: INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS, transaction_2_error_message: Sender account has insufficient funds for the transfer., transaction_2_id: None, transaction_2_sender_balance: 349999.999, transaction_2_recipient_balance: 200000, asset_type: CBDC-USD
